document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Pezothrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) in Japan and Europe, with designation of lectotype of type species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Pezothrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) in Japan and Europe, with designation of lectotype of type species

subSubSection.paragraph: ( brodskii excluded; *based on literature and images)

paragraph.keyLead: 1. Abdominal tergite VIII with posteromarginal comb complete, microtrichia long and fine, rarely a few median microtrichia short ( Figs 23 , 30 , 66 ); metascutum with paired CPS ( Fig. 20 )...................................................... 2

-. Abdominal tergite VIII with posteromarginal comb only each side or with small scallops or teeth, no long microtrichia ( Figs 42 , 51 , 60 ); metascutum with or without paired CPS ( Fig. 58 ).................................................. 7

4. Antennal segments uniformly brown; abdominal tergite VIII with median CPS in front of S1 setae [ Tibet ].....
brunicornis *

6. Antennal segment III with setae much stouter than other setae ( Fig. 33 ); abdominal tergites VII and VIII with S2 setae not reaching tergal posterior margins....................................................................
dianthi

-. Antennal segment III with setae similar to other setae ( Fig. 63 ); abdominal tergites VII and VIII with S2 setae (nearly) reaching to or exceeding posterior margins ( Fig. 67 ).....................................................
nadeshiko
n. sp.

8. Abdominal tergites with sculpture throughout; tergite VIII posteromarginal comb with small wide, irregularly spaced bases; both sexes micropterous [ Tibet ].................................................................
pediculae
*

10. Metascutum with median pair of setae close to each other, equidistant to submedian and to each other; mid and hind tibiae brownish yellow and not sharply paler than femora ( Fig. 10 ); antennal segment I without dorso-apical setae [ Mongolia ]..................................................................................................
kaszabi
*
